events.message: The claimant reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection involving two vehicles on April 30th.
The claim has been categorized as an auto accident due to multiple mentions of vehicle collision and damages.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle this vehicle collision case and assist the claimant.
The claimant received official acknowledgment of their auto accident claim, reassuring further processing.
The claimant was requested to submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and driverâ€™s license copy.
The claimant submitted all required documents including police report and vehicle repair estimates on time.
The claims investigation team has initiated the review of submitted evidence and vehicle damage assessment.
Investigation concluded confirming the incident was a two-car collision and liability is being assessed.
A settlement offer covering the repair costs of the damaged vehicle was drafted and sent to the claimant.
The claimant responded positively expressing satisfaction with the timely settlement proposal and support.
The insurance claim was approved officially after agreeing on the terms of settlement with the claimant.
Payment was issued promptly to cover the vehicle repair expenses as per the approved settlement agreement.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after all payments were confirmed and claimant satisfied.
